1.0.name: wordpress/while-it-is-loading
1.0.description: It shows a screen while all the content loads. If you have a page that takes long time to display it is a good idea to show a "wait until the page loads" image. It seems faster because now they see a message and a gear instead of just dealing with partially rendered content.
